document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Fedorenko
bibRefCitation.refString: Fedorenko, D. N. (1996) Reclassification of world Dyschiriini with a revision of the Palearctic fauna (Coleoptera, Carabidae). Pensoft, Sofia, 224 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph: Studied material: Tang Rah, Golestan Nat. Park (Prov. of Golestan), Mahmudabad and Chalus (Prov. of Mazandaran).
Studied material: Babol, Elburz Mts. (Prov. of Mazandaran).

Dyschiriodes ( Eudyschirius ) importunus importunus (Schaum, 1857 ) Studied
material: 20 km North west of Hendijan, River; Karun River, Ahwas and Shush (Prov. of Khuzestan), Bandar-e Abbas (Prov. of Hormozgan).
Studied material: Dar Agah, 9 km SW of Hajiabad and 6 km NE of Tall-e Gerdu, Bakhun Mts. (Prov. of Hormozgan), NikShahr (Prov. of Sistan va Baluchestan).

bibRefCitation.author: Fedorenko
bibRefCitation.refString: Fedorenko, D. N. (1996) Reclassification of world Dyschiriini with a revision of the Palearctic fauna (Coleoptera, Carabidae). Pensoft, Sofia, 224 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Comment:
Fedorenko ( 1996 )
cited the species from Caspian sea on/near Iranian borders, and this very rare species probably occurs in Iran as well.

Citations: Without exact locality (
Fedorenko, 1996
); Without exact locality (
Balkenohl, 2003
). Comment: Hieke & Wrase ( 1988 ) mentioned
D. strumosus (Erichson, 1837 )
from Iran but these data possibly belong to
D. rufimanus
because the occurrence of
D. strumosus
in Iran is unlikely.

bibRefCitation.author: Jeannel
bibRefCitation.refString: Jeannel, R. (1941) Coleopteres Carabiques. Faune de France, Paris, 30, 1 - 571.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dyschiriodes ( Dyschiriodes ) aeneus kouraensis (Puel, 1937 ) Studied
material: 12 km east of Kiyasar Alikolar (Prov. of Mazandaran), Neor Lake, Kuhha-ye Tales, 2500 m (Prov. of Gilan).

Comment: All Iranian quotations of
D. aeneus
belong very probably only to this ssp. not to
D. eneus (Dejean, 1825 )
.
Studied material: 9 km SW of Hajiabad (Prov. of Hormozgan), Pir Sohrab (Prov. of Sistan va Baluchestan), 7 km east of Bazangan (Prov. of Razavi Khorasan).
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Kordak River, 2008 (Prov. of Qazvin), Khalkhal: 2000 m , Kuhha-ye Tales (Prov. of Ardabil).
Comment: The occurrence of this species in Iran is doubtful and should be confirmed.

Dyschiriodes ( Dyschiriodes ) auriculatus auriculatus (Wollaston, 1867 )
= smithi (Kult, 1954 )
Studied material: Parihshan lake and 13 km South east of Shiraz (Prov. of Fars ), 40 km east of Abadan (Prov. of Khuzestan).
Studied material: Minab and Hassan Langi (Prov. of Hormozgan).

Dyschiriodes ( Dyschiriodes ) cariniceps
(Baudi di Selve, 1864 )
Studied material: 40 km South east of Abadan (Prov. of Khuzestan), Kaftarak (Prov. of Fars ).

Dyschiriodes ( Dyschiriodes ) chalceus (Erichson, 1837 ) Citations
: Without exact locality (
Fedorenko, 1996
).
Studied material: 25 km West of Gorgan (Prov. of Golestan).
Studied material: 13 km South east of Shiraz (Prov. Fars ), Bonab (Prov. of East Azarbaijan), Bandar-e Anzali (Prov. of Gilan), Bandar-e Torkeman (Prov. of Golestan).
Studied material: Delijan. 2012 (Prov. of Qom), 25 km West of Gorgan and Bandar-e Torkeman (Prov. of Mazandaran).

Studied material: Quchan Road, 6 km east of Emam Qoli, 1750 m , Kopet Dag; 20 km North west of Torbat-e Heydarieh, Senobar; Sah Jahan Mts, Mareshk, 1800 m , Kopet Dag (Prov. of North Khorasan), Shirvan-Esfarayen Road, 12 km NE of Esfarayen, Aladag Mts. (Prov. of North Khorasan); Delijan (Prov. of Qom); Polur env. (Prov. of Mazandaran).

Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Kordak River, 2008 (Prov. of Qazvin), Doroud (Prov. of Lurestan); 18 km South east of Qarah Ziya (Prov. of West Azerbaijan ), 5 km east of Miyane (Prov. of East Azerbaijan ). Citations:
New record for Iran .

Citations:
Balkenohl ( 2003 )
cited
D. nitidus (Dejean, 1825 )
from Iran under the name
D. hivensis
, whereas
Fedorenko ( 1996 )
generally cited this species from Iran but he did not cite ssp. chivensis from this country. Comment: It is necessary to check which ssp. occurs in Iran .

Studied material: Rudbar, Bareh Sar (Prov. of Gilan), 11 km South of Ramian (Prov. of Golestan), 27 km SW of Chanaran; SW of Ferizi, Binalud Mts. (Prov. of Razavi Khorasan), Kuh-e Sabalan (Prov. of Ardabil), Bandar-e Abbas (Prov. of Hormozgan); ( ZMTU ): Dohezar River, 2008 ; 20 km SW of Pol-e Sefid; 2 km NE of Allahband; 12 km east of Kiyasar; Tonekabon and Chalus (Prov. of Mazandaran).
Studied material: Kuh-e Khvajeh (Prov. of Sistan va Baluchestan).

Citations: East of Iran , Hamon River and Hosseyn Abad (Prov. of Sistan va Baluchestan;
Fedorenko, 1992
). Comment;
Balkenohl ( 2003 )
cited this species from Iran under the both subspecific names:
D. politus (Dejean, 1825 )
and
D. chamunensis
. According to
Fedorenko ( 1996 )
in Iran occurs only ssp.
chamunensis
and all specimens of
D. politus
cited from Iran belong only to this subrecently described ssp.

bibRefCitation.author: Fedorenko
bibRefCitation.refString: Fedorenko, D. N. (1996) Reclassification of world Dyschiriini with a revision of the Palearctic fauna (Coleoptera, Carabidae). Pensoft, Sofia, 224 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dyschiriodes ( Paradyschirius ) bifrons (Andrewes, 1929 ) Studied
material: Bahu-Kalat; 13 km South east of NikShahr; Sarbaz env, Sarbaz River (Prov. of Sistan va Baluchestan).

Dyschiriodes ( Paradyschirius ) parallelus parallelus (Motschulsky, 1844 ) Studied
material: 11 km South of Chalus (Prov. of Mazandaran).

Citations:
Fedorenko ( 1996 )
mentioned possible occurrence of this species in North of Iran . Citations:
New record for Iran .
